text:
Hi.  I have a contact with a custom association and want to return the most recent association of the contact.  I am using "limit=1&orderby=hs_createdate"
```{% set objects = crm_associations(contact.hs_object_id, "USER_DEFINED",78,"limit=1&orderby=hs_createdate","description,amount,is_auto_recurring,campaign,hs_createdate",false)%}```
But this returns the first rather than the last association.  Is that the correct way to do things and how do a reverse the order.

Thanks

Anyone wants to explain this one to me? :thinking_face:
How can `quote.link` be null in the first output, but exist in the second?

Seems to be a bug revolving the 'type: url' field default.
When dragging the module onto the page it gives me the output from image 2 above, but when manually  switching over to "CONTENT" and the back to "EXTERNAL" it will start returning different data >_>
